retirement.title: ACTION REQUIRED: Your Cardano stake pool is retiring
retirement.message:
Your Cardano stake pool **{{poolNameOrHash}}**{{optionalTicker}} is retiring. You will need to re-delegate your ADA to another stake pool to continue earning rewards. You can find a list of available stake pools on many of the Cardano blockchain explorers, or in your wallet:

- https://adapools.org/pool
- https://cexplorer.io/pool
- https://pooltool.io/pools
retirement.textMessage: Your Cardano stake pool {{tickerOrHash}} is retiring. You will need to re-delegate your ADA to another stake pool to continue earning rewards.
